bug.author: gmanlan
bug.summary: Link to "build_config" and many other links @ README.MD are not working
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Problem location</denchmark-h>
README.MD --> 4. Building mlpack from source --> See<denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build.html#build_config> this section of the build guide</denchmark-link> for more details, including a full list of options, and their default values. The same happens with many other links @ README.MD <denchmark-h:h4>Description of problem</denchmark-h>
The link doesn't work - probably after the recent changes to the documentation/website

comments.comment: Thanks for pointing this out---I opened a fix with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1808>#1808</denchmark-link> .
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1808>#1808</denchmark-link> is merged, so I'll go ahead and close this now. If you find anything else please do feel free to open an issue. :)
